quote: At her birthday, my seven-year-old daughter will say that she wants these big cakes and certain expensive toys as presents, and I can't say no to her. It would just break my heart. But when I was little, for birthdays we just played outside and we were happy if we got any cake.

quote: I married two weeks after my 18th birthday, far too young, and by the time I was 23 I was a single mother of three small children, Sean, Daniel and Victoria, living in a prefab house.

quote: There is still no cure for the common birthday.

quote: Like many women my age, I am 28 years old.

quote: I was fired by 'America's Next Top Model' on my birthday.

quote: My parents were dishonest people. If it was my birthday, I knew my mother took me to the K-Mart and she stole my toy. She'd put it in the shopping cart and we'd walk out. I was raised with that.

quote: Our birthdays are feathers in the broad wing of time.
author: Jean Paul

quote: I have had fans make me the big picture collages of the photo books I have had fans send me birthday cakes... sing to me on my voicemail. I have had fans flash me. I have had older fans give me their bras and underwear onstage.

quote: If we celebrate Martin Luther King Jr.'s birthday at a time of presidential inaugurals, this is thanks to Ronald Reagan who created the holiday, and not to the Democratic Congress of the Carter years, which rejected it.

quote: I'm not materialistic. I believe in presents from the heart, like a drawing that a child does.

quote: For the youth, the indignation of most things will just surge as each birthday passes.

quote: All my favorite stars, my family and my friends are here. I'm having the happiest birthday that an 18-year-old girl could ever have.

quote: I think I thought it would be important for electronics as we knew it then, but that was a much simpler business and electronics was mostly radio and television and the first computers.

quote: We need comprehensive reform that will make America the best place in the world to invest and do business.

quote: It's called a pen. It's like a printer, hooked straight to my brain.

quote: Writing fiction has become a priestly business in countries that have lost their faith.

quote: When you raise taxes on small business, from 35% to 40%, you will kill jobs.

quote: I mean, I'm in the business of storytelling, not message making.

quote: International business may conduct its operations with scraps of paper, but the ink it uses is human blood.

quote: There is nothing more requisite in business than despatch.

quote: And fifth, we will champion small businesses, America's engine of job growth. That means reducing taxes on business, not raising them. quote: I love my family very much. I wish I could see them a little more often than I do. But we understand because we're a show business family and we all work.

quote: My son is now an 'entrepreneur.' That's what you're called when you don't have a job.

quote: Today I can announce a raft of reforms that we estimate could save over 2.5 million police hours every year. That's the equivalent of more than 1,200 police officer posts. These reforms are a watershed moment in policing. They show that we really mean business in busting bureaucracy.

quote: If you create something that is asking for people to respond as they're going to respond, you have to allow them to respond as they're going to respond. Some of the people are going to be uninterested and some people are going to be mad for some reason, which is their business. That's just the way the world is.

quote: Wise are those who learn that the bottom line doesn't always have to be their top priority.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: Money is a strange business. People who haven't got it aim it strongly. People who have are full of troubles.

quote: You have to stick out the toughness of the business and form relationships with the people in it.

quote: It takes more than capital to swing business. You've got to have the A. I. D. degree to get by - Advertising, Initiative, and Dynamics.

quote: I'm someone who loves to enjoy life and tries to focus on real things and real friendships. That's why I live very simply. I'm a jeans and T-shirt kind of girl. author: Cameron Diaz

quote: It's not just Bin Laden or just those that are involved in the counterterrorism effort. We've gotta cast the net broader than that. But I think it's a - very special tribute that we all owe to the bravery and courage of the men and women in the intelligence and military business who performed so well to finally get it done.

quote: White shall not neutralize the black, nor good compensate bad in man, absolve him so: life's business being just the terrible choice.
author: Robert Browning

quote: Kids are brought into show business because they are cute and see truth and they're very bright. But there's a sense of doing it because you want the adults to be approving of you. You want to make them happy.

quote: They keep the old business. We keep the ongoing business.

quote: If we must have a tyrant, let him at least be a gentleman who has been bred to the business, and let us fall by the axe and not by the butcher's cleaver.
author: Lord Byron

quote: The business schools reward difficult complex behavior more than simple behavior, but simple behavior is more effective.

quote: Positive thinking is the key to success in business, education, pro football, anything that you can mention. I go out there thinking that I'm going to complete every pass.

quote: I believe fundamental honesty is the keystone of business.

quote: Perhaps the single most dramatic example of this phenomenon of software eating a traditional business is the suicide of Borders and corresponding rise of Amazon.

quote: As unmarried business women we must constantly use our opportunities in business in such a way that we are prepared for the marriage which may be ours tomorrow.
author: Odlum, Hortense

quote: I genuinely believe that if you want to get in the film business, get in the film business.
author: Daniel Craig

quote: The business of America is business.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: Business is constantly changing, constantly evolving.
author: James Dyson

quote: I went onto reality TV as a business decision.
author: Bethenny Frankel

quote: I am just absolutely convinced that the best formula for giving us peace and preserving the American way of life is freedom, limited government, and minding our own business overseas.

quote: Not for nothing is their motto TGIF - 'Thank God It's Friday.' They live for the weekends, when they can go do what they really want to do.
author: Richard Nelson Bolles

quote: I find it rather easy to portray a businessman. Being bland, rather cruel and incompetent comes naturally to me.
author: John Cleese

quote: Reading is not a duty, and has consequently no business to be made disagreeable.
author: Aneurin Bevan

quote: A belief in God is vitally important, not just in show business, but stability in life. You know, to recognize deity is the most important thing that you can do. I mean, it comes to the Ten Commandments. They weren't ten suggestions. They were Ten Commandments.

quote: Performing doesn't turn me on. It's an egomaniac business, filled with prima donnas - including this one.
author: Dan Rather

quote: I still have a lot to learn - about the business, about music, and about myself. Its exciting.
author: Britney Spears

quote: I'm someone who loves to enjoy life and tries to focus on real things and real friendships. That's why I live very simply. I'm a jeans and T-shirt kind of girl. I don't spend much time fixing myself up or trying to look cool. I live like a normal person and even though I'm in a very high-profile business, I really don't let it affect the way I live.
author: Cameron Diaz

quote: To succeed in business it is necessary to make others see things as you see them.

quote: It's like driving a car at night. You never see further than your headlights, but you can make the whole trip that way.
author: E. L. Doctorow

quote: Now, personally, I like a car with some sort of character.
author: Richard Hammond

quote: Shutting off the thought process is not rejuvenating the mind is like a car battery - it recharges by running.
author: Bill Watterson

quote: I'm not gonna ride home in the car. I'll wait for Randy. I think I'll get home quicker.
author: Patsy Cline

quote: My kids always perceived the bathroom as a place where you wait it out until all the groceries are unloaded from the car.

quote: In life, you need a house and a car. After that, you have a choice.
author: Xavier Niel

quote: You're pulling 4-5G for a lot of the corners around the lap. We build up lactic acid because there are a lot of vibrations in the car, and you have to have strong legs to hit the brake pedal. We need to be fit to do every lap at 100%.

quote: Every time I get into a Nationwide car after being in a Cup car, I feel so much more comfortable than I did previously.

quote: Sometimes, when my wife and I were going out to dinner, I would take my laptop with me and work in the car, so as to take advantage of the half hour going and coming.

quote: I will never have a drink and get behind the wheel of a car. It's not illegal to drink and drive, but there becomes a certain point where it does become a crime.
author: Tracey Gold

quote: I did a lot of gasoline commercials - Hess, Texaco. I was part of the family in the car, the little brat in the back.
author: Ricky Schroder

quote: Of course, I'm older now. I'm in a different place in my life than when I wrote the songs for 'Car Wheels' or 'Essence' or whatever. Different things were going on.

quote: When I do retire, I know for a fact that I'll never be able to replace the incredible feeling I get when I'm driving an F1 car.

quote: I took guitar a while back, and my heart wasn't in it at the time, but I'm ready to try it again. I sing in the car, at home - it's a huge part of my life, especially since I'm from Tennessee.
author: Lucy Hale

quote: But once you have satisfied your material needs, which I think every wealth creator should - the house, the car, the plane, the boat - what comes next?
author: Tom Hunter

quote: At root fame is a sham. I'm not going to live forever and if I am I certainly need don't you to tell me that so that I will buy a car or a box of dried up crackers.
author: Nick Mancuso

quote: A man who has never gone to school may steal from a freight car but if he has a university education, he may steal the whole railroad.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: I just completed a tour in Europe. I played every night. This requires traveling some days for six hours in a van or a train or a car. After six weeks of that, I checked into the hotel and just fell apart.
author: Lee Konitz

quote: There's a lot of stress... but once you get in the car, all that goes out the window.

quote: I'm a car singer, in fact sometimes I pretend to take my dog out for a walk, and I'll just drive him around and start singin'.

quote: I don't drive around London much. Any journey around Islington involves hundreds of speed bumps that seem to tear the bottom of your car off.
author: Alan Davies

quote: We're just into toys, whether it's motorcycles or race cars or computers. I've got the Palm Pilot right here with me, I've got the world's smallest phone. Maybe it's just because I'm still a big little kid and I just love toys, you know?

quote: Ford used to come to work in a big car with two Admiral's flags, on each side of the car. His assistant would be there with his accordion, playing, Hail to the Chief.
author: Richard Widmark

quote: If a movie is really working, you forget for two hours your Social Security number and where your car is parked. You are having a vicarious experience. You are identifying, in one way or another, with the people on the screen.
author: Roger Ebert

quote: I used to look like a deer in headlights on the red carpet. You step out of the car and it's bedlam. Everyone's got crazy eyes.
author: Emily Blunt

quote: When you're in a car which can win every race, or fight for a win every race, that is pressure.
author: Jenson Button

quote: The best car safety device is a rear-view mirror with a cop in it.
author: Dudley Moore

quote: I was an economics major in college, and every summer after school, I would drive my car from California, from Claremont men's college at the time, to New York. And I worked on Wall Street.
author: Henry Kravis

quote: Since my induction into the Sports Hall of Fame, I have wanted to have my No. 3 Chevy on exhibit for sports fans to see. I hope others will enjoy the car as much as I have.
author: Junior Johnson

quote: A lot of fun stuff happens when you go out on a bike compared to when you're in a car. You're more in the environment. It's enjoyable. Even when It's raining It's still fun.
author: Stone Gossard

quote: I've crashed my car three times.
author: Billy Joel

quote: Since September 11, security has been increased everywhere, and we have new IDs to get on to the Fox lot. I drove to the security gate, but realized I'd left my ID in my other car. I just broke into that voice - 'Hey, man, I'm Bart Simpson. Who else sounds like this?' The guard waved me through.
author: Nancy Cartwright

quote: I was in prison for a charge in Texas, murder one. Back in the '70s in Texas, I was there. I heard the shot. I was in the car.
author: Duane Chapman

quote: We all drive differently and have different styles. For me I need a car I can develop beneath me and feel comfortable in. If the car feels neutral and unbalanced it doesn't work for me.
author: Jenson Button

quote: I'm calling from my car, I'm sorry, I'm like running around like crazy.
author: Melissa Joan Hart

quote: As soon as I get my car I think I'll be going to the cinema more. Since I don't go very often, there are no films that are a must see at the moment. I usually wait till they come out on DVD.
author: Tom Felton

quote: I borrowed my friend's car the other day in an attempt to persuade my husband that we needed a car and literally this is true, in the first day of borrowing the car, I got three tickets and I rear-ended it.
author: Emily Mortimer

quote: I don't like to go over curbs, because I don't want to be hard on the car.
author: Alain Prost

quote: ER was one of my favourites. I played a car accident victim who has leukemia. I got to wear a neck brace and nose tubes for the two days I worked.
author: Dakota Fanning

quote: I don't know how to drive a car.
author: Javier Bardem

quote: When the Exxon Valdez spilled in 1989, I was angry. I even wrote on the back of my car, Boycott Exxon!
author: Alexandra Paul

quote: I don't get rattled about the big things. I get rattled when I have to pick up my laundry, get gas in the car, pick up a script.
author: Sherry Stringfield

quote: I think that people don't know how to do anything anymore. My father was a janitor. He could take a car apart and put it back together. He could build a house in the back yard. Today, if you ask people what they know, they say, 'I know how to hire someone.'
author: Walter Mosley

quote: When I was 15, my parents left town for a month. They hid the keys to the car, but I found them. That month, I drove my stepdad's Thunderbird Super Coupe into Manhattan every day, and I would crank Cypress Hill as I flew around the city, racing the taxis.
author: Danny Masterson

quote: I mean, you have a general tone of it but it's pretty much you get to come in and you're going to flip this car and it's going to blow up and you're going to come out on fire and you go oh, that's cool, and then you get paid a lot of money.
author: David R. Ellis

quote: I've always been a bit of a car freak.
author: Eric Bana

quote: My dream car would be a Maserati. That would be amazing.
author: Jordana Brewster

quote: See, what you're meant to do when you have a mid-life crisis is buy a fast car, aren't you? Well, I've always had fast cars. It's not that. It's the fear that you're past your best. It's the fear that the stuff you've done in the past is your best work.
author: Robbie Coltraine

quote: As I was coming out of the closet, our car was hurtling over an embankment.
author: Lance Loud

quote: I want a Mini-Cooper because it's fuel efficient, emissions efficient and all that stuff. It's small and better for the environment. I think that will be my next car.
author: Christina Ricci

quote: Just because everything is different doesn't mean anything has changed.
author: Irene Peter

quote: Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself.
author: Tolstoy, Leo

quote: I just think we're living in a time of massive, amazing change, like the Industrial Revolution on acid.
author: Kelly Lynch

quote: I've had some movies that have been ridiculed, but that's OK with me. I don't feel that really defines me. Should I change who I am to be popular?
author: Kevin Costner

quote: All great change in America begins at the dinner table.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: Vengeance is not the point change is. But the trouble is that in most people's minds the thought of victory and the thought of punishing the enemy coincide.
author: Barbara Deming

quote: Time is neutral and does not change things. With courage and initiative, leaders change things.
author: Jesse Jackson

quote: I know how bad Albany is. I know it better than most. I understand why people are angry. I'm angry. The question is going to be, how do you change Albany, what is the plan for change, and then how do you actually get it done?
author: Andrew Cuomo

quote: Life belongs to the living, and he who lives must be prepared for changes.
author: von Goethe, Johann Wolfgang

quote: Since we cannot change reality, let us change the eyes which see reality.
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: I think sometimes when children grow up, their parents grow up. Mine grew up with me. We coexist. I don't try to change them anymore, and I don't think they try to change me.
author: Katy Perry

quote: I wouldn't change a thing - except my bank balance.
author: Johnny Thunders

quote: Loss is nothing else but change, and change is Nature's delight.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Lord, where we are wrong, make us willing to change where we are right, make us easy to live with.
author: Peter Marshall

quote: I think your alcohol intake has to change. You know, usually a big person feels they can drink anything they want to and as much as they want to and I've cut that way back.
author: Mike Ditka

quote: In a progressive country change is constant; ... change ... is inevitable.
author: Disraeli, Benjamin

quote: No one can persuade another to change. Each of us guards a gate of change that can only be opened from the inside. We cannot open the gate of another, either by argument or emotional appeal.
author: Marilyn Ferguson

quote: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
author: Simone de Beauvoir

quote: One expected growth, change without it, the world was less, the well of inspiration dried up, the muses fled.
author: Charles de Lint

quote: Sometimes we look for those thunderous things to happen in our life for our lives to change or go in the other direction. We seek the miracle. We seek the parting of the seas, the moving of the mountains. But no, it's a quiet thing. At least for me it was.
author: Ben Vereen

quote: I don't think you can work on feelings in politics, apart from anything else, political change can come very unexpectedly, sometimes overnight when you least expect it.
author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quote: True life is lived when tiny changes occur.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: A small group of thoughtful people could change the world. Indeed, it's the only thing that ever has.
author: Margaret Mead

quote: As life runs on, the road grows strange with faces new - and near the end. The milestones into headstones change, Neath every one a friend.
author: James Russell Lowell

quote: I believe that Gandhi was correct. Non-violent civil disobedience is the only way to bring about change that allows people to enjoy the change and not get killed in the process.
author: Edward James Olmos

quote: My friends, love is better than anger. Hope is better than fear. Optimism is better than despair. So let us be loving, hopeful and optimistic. And we'll change the world.
author: Jack Layton

quote: Man can certainly flee from God... but he cannot escape him. He can certainly hate God and be hateful to God, but he cannot change into its opposite the eternal love of God which triumphs even in his hate.
author: Karl Barth

quote: Discovery consists in seeing whateveryone else has seen and thinking what no one else has thought.
author: von Nagyrapolt, Albert

quote: Ethics and equity and the principles of justice do not change with the calendar.
author: David Herbert Lawrence

quote: If you want to make enemies, try to change something.
author: Woodrow Wilson

quote: But I think it's more that when you're young, you're invincible, you're immortal - or at least you think you are. The possibilities are limitless, you're inventing the future. Then you get older and suddenly you have a history. It's fixed. You can't change anything. I find that a bit disturbing, to be honest.
author: Damien Hirst

quote: Change is certain.  Peace is followed by disturbances; departure of evil men by their return.  Such recurrences should not constitute occasions for sadness but realities for awareness, so that one may be happy in the interim.
author: Ching, I

quote: If a person with a bullet in Dallas can change the world, imagine a person with an idea could do.
author: J. Michael Straczynski

quote: Some people seem to understand this - that life and change take time - but I am not one of those people.
author: Anne Lamott

quote: That's the thing about interviews, at some point you're going to change your mind. But it's there forever and you can't escape it.
author: Martha Plimpton

quote: This is a fantastic time to be entering the business world, because business is going to change more in the next 10 years than it has in the last 50.
author: Bill Gates

quote: That last day does not bring extinction to us, but change of place.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: The only sense that is common in the long run, is the sense of change and we all instinctively avoid it.
author: E. B. White

quote: I can't change overnight into a serious literary author. You can't compare apples to oranges. William Faulkner was a great literary genius. I am not.
author: John Grisham

quote: Excuses change nothing, but make everyone feel better.
author: Cooley, Mason

quote: Ducking for apples; change one letter and it's the story of my life.
author: Parker, Dorothy

quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: The only difference between me and others is that they think they can change something with cute little poems, nice cards or embracing trees and being nice to little lapdogs.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: Change is one of my favourite words.
author: Carol Vorderman

quote: I am artistic so I reserve the right to change my mind at any point. I just like to do different things. What is more important than the name is that people know that I really like acting, I enjoy it and I want people to know that I am serious.
author: LL Cool J

quote: If you do not change direction, you may end up where you are heading.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: When you go off in the world and make your life, and you come back to your home town, and you find your old high-school friends driving in the same circles, doing the same things, that's what Hollywood's like. It's a little block, little town. It doesn't really grow or change.
author: Robert Rodriguez

quote: Until we totally change the way we elect our leaders, until we remove private money from public campaigns, lying will be the de facto method of governance in this country.
author: Peter Schuyler

quote: Consistency requires you to be as ignorant today as you were a year ago.
author: Berenson, Bernard

quote: My play Safe Sex was picked apart because critics thought it was untrue. It was a play in which no one had AIDS, but the characters talked about how it was going to change their lives.
author: Harvey Fierstein

quote: I started on an Apple II, which I had bought at the very end of 1978 for half of my annual income. I made $4,500 a year, and I spent half of it on the computer.
author: Bill Budge

quote: It was a huge challenge to learn digital painting well enough so that computers don't pop into mind when one sees one.
author: Berkeley Breathed

quote: Gee, I am a complete Luddite when it comes to computers, I can barely log on!
author: Jonathan Shapiro

quote: We have an epidemic of sexual predators following our children, whether it be on the computers, whether it be in our public parks, whether it be in the workplace, or even our schools.
author: Jon Porter

quote: In the practical world of computing, it is rather uncommon that a program, once it performs correctly and satisfactorily, remains unchanged forever.
author: Niklaus Wirth

quote: If your computer speaks English, it was probably made in Japan.
author: Alan Perlis

quote: It is an interesting fact that during my tour I was never allowed access to computers, radios, or anything else that I might damage through curiosity, or perhaps something more sinister.
author: Robert B. Laughlin

quote: We're entering a new world in which data may be more important than software.
author: Tim O'Reilly

quote: So the thing I realized rather gradually - I must say starting about 20 years ago now that we know about computers and things - there's a possibility of a more general basis for rules to describe nature.
author: Stephen Wolfram

quote: I am not the only person who uses his computer mainly for the purpose of diddling with his computer.
author: Dave Barry

quote: I have a crazy amount of different jobs, so the way I manage that is to not do more than one at a time. It's like old computers that had small memory chips, they would do something called swapping, where they would fill the memory with one task, do it and get it out.
author: Louis C. K.

quote: There is no reason for any individual to have a computer in his home.
author: Ken Olsen

quote: A lot of journalists like to suck up to celebrities, and then as soon as they're a safe distance away at their computers, they take shots. But that's the way society has become, especially in pop culture.
author: Scott Weiland

quote: There were no PCs when I started programming on computers.
author: Dave Winer

quote: I use many different gadgets connected with computers I use PCs, laptops and a Palm Pilot. I also use the Internet to visit websites, especially within Polish-language Internet. I usually go to political discussion groups and sites - of course, as I use my real name, people never believe that they are chatting with me!
author: Lech Walesa

quote: Because I believe that humans are computers, I conjectured that computers, like people, can have left- and right-handed versions.
author: Philip Emeagwali

quote: What I was proud of was that I used very few parts to build a computer that could actually speak words on a screen and type words on a keyboard and run a programming language that could play games. And I did all this myself.
author: Steve Wozniak

quote: Yet in this global economy, no jobs are safe. High-speed Internet connections and low-cost, skilled labor overseas are an explosive combination.
author: Bob Taft

quote: Computer science is no more about computers than astronomy is about telescopes.
author: Edsger Dijkstra

quote: A wonderful thing about a book, in contrast to a computer screen, is that you can take it to bed with you.
author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: I happen to think that computers are the most important thing to happen to musicians since the invention of cat-gut which was a long time ago.
author: Robert Moog

quote: I don't care how big and fast computers are, they're not as big and fast as the world.
author: Herbert Simon

quote: You can't trust the internet.
author: Nicolette Sheridan

quote: We demand privacy, yet we glorify those that break into computers.
author: Bill McCollum

quote: I realized that I loved using computers to create something, but being an architect just wasn't going to keep me interested. The idea of a life spent obsessing over bathroom details for an Upper East Side penthouse was pretty depressing.
author: Joseph Kosinski

quote: The only thing I do on a computer is play Texas Hold 'Em, really. Obviously my cell phone is a computer. My car is a computer. I'm on computers every day without actively seeking them out.
author: John Hawkes

quote: We can just assume they have much more and powerful, more advanced technology, all the new computers, everything could be much more easier and help them to build much more and many more nuclear weapons.
author: Mordechai Vanunu

quote: Interactive computers and software will, I think, provide a less costly method of doing some kinds of inquiry, in knowledge acquisition and even reasoning and interaction.
author: Roy Romer

quote: Computers themselves, and software yet to be developed, will revolutionize the way we learn.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Right now, computers, which are supposed to be our servant, are oppressing us.
author: Jef Raskin

quote: Today, computers are almost second nature to most of us.
author: James Dyson

quote: I've never had Internet access. Actually, I have looked at things on other people's computers as a bystander. A few times in my life I've opened email accounts, twice actually, but it's something I don't want in my life right now.
author: Jhumpa Lahiri

quote: I actually use a computer a lot. I have three computers that I use on a regular basis - one is on my desk top in my Washington office, another is at home, and I have my laptop that I use when I'm travelling.
author: Rick Boucher

quote: I'm looking to evolve the concept of the new renaissance artist, taking the world by storm through the art of public display and demonstration, with technical savvy, using cell phones and computers.
author: Perry Farrell

quote: What I try to do is factor in how people use computers, what people's problems are, and how these technologies can get applied to those problems. Then I try to direct the various product groups to act on this information.
author: John Warnock

quote: When I'm not writing or tweaking my computer, I do embroidery. When I'm not plunging into the past, tweaking, or embroidering, I'm reading books about history, computers, or embroidery.
author: Lynn Abbey

quote: What we did not imagine was a Web of people, but a Web of documents.
author: Dale Dougherty

quote: With our work at Kazaa, we began seeing growing broadband connections and more powerful computers and more streaming multimedia, and we saw that the traditional way of communicating by phone no longer made a lot of sense.
author: Niklas Zennstrom

quote: I think I thought it would be important for electronics as we knew it then, but that was a much simpler business and electronics was mostly radio and television and the first computers.
author: Jack Kilby

quote: I've always been at the intersection of computers and whatever they can revolutionize.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: Before computers, telephone lines and television connect us, we all share the same air, the same oceans, the same mountains and rivers. We are all equally responsible for protecting them.
author: Julia Louis-Dreyfus

quote: Well, my wife always says to me, and I think it's true, it's very difficult for us to understand the Elizabethan understanding and enjoyment and perception of form as it is to say... it would be for them to understand computers or going to the moon or something.
author: Mark Rylance

quote: Most of the musicians that I know almost to the man everybody uses Apple computers. They've thought of the steps that you're going to think of when you're trying to create your thing. And that's where the tools get invented to make better art.
author: Mike Shinoda

quote: Computers make it easier to do a lot of things, but most of the things they make it easier to do don't need to be done.
author: Andy Rooney

quote: There is a real danger that computers will develop intelligence and take over. We urgently need to develop direct connections to the brain so that computers can add to human intelligence rather than be in opposition.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: People don't understand computers. Computers are magical boxes that do things. People believe what computers tell them.
author: Bruce Schneier

quote: The trick with computers I think, is to approach old and new things with the same reverence as you would like your favourite chair and not be seduced by the constant innovation otherwise you never do anything.
author: Colin Greenwood

quote: Computers in classrooms are the filmstrips of the 1990s.
author: Clifford Stoll

quote: Video games and computers have become babysitters for kids.
author: Taylor Kitsch

quote: Our lives sometimes depend on computers performing as predicted.
author: Philip Emeagwali

quote: It's cool to go places where working people are happy.
author: Neil Young

quote: I like doing theaters. I like being up close and personal with the fans. It's really cool.
author: Ruben Studdard

quote: Good words cool more than cold water.
author: John Ray

quote: How serious can a movie about time-traveling robots be? You want it to be cool and fun.
author: Christian Bale

quote: I'd wear flip-flops and jeans. I guess that's not cool.
author: Bill Rancic

quote: I'm not a movie star. People know me, but they don't necessarily know what they know me for. I get recognised, but it's not like Justin Bieber. It's a nice thing, people are cool.
author: Harry Connick, Jr.

quote: I remember being in Atlantic City once when I was 18 or 19, and a sea of people were screaming and pulling their hair because I was there. It was weird. Nobody deserves adulation like that. I tried to explain it to my kids once. I said, 'Mommy used to be kind of cool, kind of like a Britney Spears.'
author: Genie Francis

quote: People spend hours constantly checking and tweeting and Facebooking. And it's cool to check up on your friends and see what's going on in the world, but it's not cool to spend five hours of your day on the computer looking at the Internet.
author: Ty Segall

quote: One interviewer asked me: 'How do you feel that you've betrayed your father?' That wasn't really very cool.
author: Dhani Harrison

quote: Adele's amazing, I think the world of her and her music and I think Tinie Tempah is cool. To work with someone like Kanye West would be awesome.
author: Joe Jonas

quote: Maybe I am a little bit guilty of trying to convince myself that I am cool to this point - even today. But I am so much more healthy than I used to be in my twenties, because I was not accepted at all.
author: Donny Osmond

quote: My niece was very much caught up in the vampire craze for young adults, and she thought having a vampire boyfriend would be a cool thing. What do you do on a first date? The more I thought about it, the more fun I had imagining what you'd serve a vampire for dinner.
author: Deborah Harkness

quote: I'm not saying I look cool, but every single time I go onstage, it is a fail if I don't feel like I'm going to pass out at least twice.
author: Kesha

quote:
Allen Gregory' came about because we wanted an animated show and we were just tossing around some ideas about me playing a 7-year-old. We thought that would be cool, because we couldn't do that in real life.;Jonah Hill;cool
10929;Even though my father was a radio comedian, it wasn't cool to say, at a young age, 'I want to be a comedian.
author: Albert Brooks

quote: Some of the hip-hop stuff people get into is exciting, because there's a passion and there's something to explain to a more mainstream audience, so you get these passionate writers who want to express their love for rap and hip-hop, which is cool.
author: Cameron Crowe

quote: But when you're a working actor - and that's what you keep saying in your head, how blessed you are to have a job - and you are working with heavyweights, working with the best guys in TV, it's pretty cool. Exhausting, but cool.
author: Christopher Meloni

quote: Survival, in the cool economics of biology, means simply the persistence of one's own genes in the generations to follow.
author: Lewis Thomas

quote: I'm not hip, I'm not cool, I'm not glib.
author: Eric Bogosian

quote: The ballplayer who loses his head, who can't keep his cool, is worse than no ballplayer at all.
author: Lou Gehrig

quote: Keep cool my babies.
author: Conan O'Brien

quote: Internet mailing lists are like Fox television shows. They have really cool previews, and they get you all excited about them, but they just don't live up to their promises.
author: John Dobbin

quote: Cynicism is kind of like folding your arms and stepping back and commenting on things, like the old guys in 'The Muppets,' just throwing out comments all the time, whereas there are other people on the ground really trying to affect things and improve their lives and the lives of other people. I think it's noble and I think it's cool.
author: Josh Radnor

quote: Almost any film that you do is an opportunity to open you up and make you more aware of an area that you might not be thinking about. That's what is kind of cool, or one of the cool things about this profession.
author: Joan Allen

quote: One interviewer asked me: 'How do you feel that you've betrayed your father?' That wasn't really very cool.
author: Dhani Harrison

quote: My parents have always been cool. They even became surrogates to friends of mine who didn't have such supportive parents.
author: Olivia Williams

quote: Even in high school, I had friends that I didn't know were gay until years later. I'd find out on Facebook or something and be like, 'Oh, that explains some things,' or 'Wow, no wonder they were so cool.'
author: Kellan Lutz

quote: I got tired of the Ramones around the time I quit and I really got into rap. I thought it was the new punk rock. LL Cool J was my biggest idol.
author: Dee Dee Ramone

quote: I do, I kick major butt in 'Dredd.' I get to kill people. I break a guy's neck by roundhouse kicking him in the face. It was me, I did it. I learned how to roundhouse kick. I also do it with my hands cuffed behind my back so it's pretty cool I have to say. Yeah, leather body suit, blonde hair, the whole thing.
author: Olivia Thirlby

quote: Growing up, politics never trickled down to the areas we come from. But people from Obama's camp, and Obama himself, reached out to me and asked for my help on the campaign. We've sat and had dinner, and we've spoken on the phone. He's a very sharp guy. Very charming. Very cool.
author: Jay-Z

quote: The truth is - I found myself doing these huge action-adventure movies, and um, and which are cool man. And I really love doing them. And thankfully I haven't had too much dialogue, because if I had I would have really made a mess of it. You know what I mean?
author: Orlando Bloom

quote: Personally, I was never the cool kid. I was always sort of a bookworm.
author: Zac Efron

quote: I like low-maintenance girls, but at the same time, classy. She needs to take care of herself. But also be a girl who isn't afraid to get sweaty and play basketball, so it's cool if she's a tomboy.
author: Chris Brown

quote: What we do every night is we change out the set list as much as we can to make sure that (fans can) go home and tell their friends they experienced something unique and cool.
author: Isaac Hanson

quote: We aren't cool and never will be.
author: Chris Martin

quote: I didn't come to Hollywood to drink or get high, and I don't want to be considered a cool actor - I want to be a great actor.
author: Tom Sizemore

quote: It's really cool when a guy tips 20 per cent quickly and effortlessly so that when the check comes, he opens it and signs his name and done.
author: Danica McKellar

quote: White people couldn't do black music back in the day because they weren't funky or bad enough. They weren't from the ghettoes, but hip-hop and R&ampB changed all of that because white kids want to be down with it. They wanted to learn it so they studied the culture. It's kind of a cool thing because we shouldn't be so separate.
author: Narada Michael Walden

quote: I'm cool with failing so long as I know that there are people around me that love me unconditionally.
author: Dave Chappelle

quote: Justin Timberlake is everything, and what more could you want in a person? He's funny. He's cute. He's great. He just understands. I get him and he gets me, and that's cool.
author: Britney Spears

quote: Being an author of banned books is cool, I've decided.
author: Lauren Myracle

quote: There's no point in swanning through and being cool as a breeze in every scene. It's not really that interesting. Even if you're a superhero.
author: Michael Fassbender

quote: Greg Berlanti, David Nutter, Andrew Kreisberg and Marc Guggenheim are the people I wanted to work with. They're smart, they're funny, they're cool, they're edgy.
author: Katie Cassidy

quote: I have a cycle that is not particularly cool, but it's a cycle: trash myself to reward myself.
author: Jeff Bridges

quote: I always looked really young for my age. And once I hit 23, 24 and 25, I was then allowed to play the cool 18-year-olds and stuff.
author: Ben Barnes

quote: My band is so dedicated, everybody works very hard. The No. 1 priority is the show, and it's pretty cool because we all pull together, and it's fun. It's like being on a sports team or something.
author: Bob Seger

quote: The ballplayer who loses his head, who can't keep his cool, is worse than no ballplayer at all.
author: Lou Gehrig

quote: To create well I have to be in a good mood, happy and cool.
author: Marc Newson

quote: Keep a cool head and maintain a low profile. Never take the lead - but aim to do something big.
author: Deng Xiaoping

quote: I don't mind what the role is at all I just want to play cool characters.
author: Daniel Cudmore

quote: I'm not that into reading. If I'm gonna read, I'm gonna read some cool sci-fi book or something, not some stupid self-help book.
author: Jon Heder

quote: If you could get up the courage to begin, you have the courage to succeed.
author: David Viscott

quote: There's only one requirement of any of us, and that is to be courageous. Because courage, as you might know, defines all other human behavior. And, I believe - because I've done a little of this myself - pretending to be courageous is just as good as the real thing.
author: David Letterman

quote: The President regards the Japanese as a brave people but courage, though useful in time of war, is subordinate to knowledge of arts hence, courage without such knowledge is not to be highly esteemed.
author: Townsend Harris

quote: In the inhalation and exhalation there is an energy and a lively divine spirit, since He, through his spirit supports the breath of life, giving courage to the people who are in the earth and spirit to those who walk on it.
author: Michael Servetus

quote: Courage is grace under pressure.
author: Hemingway, Ernest

quote: What has made America amazing has been the fact that throughout our history, throughout the more than 200 years of our history, there have been men and women of courage who stood up and decided it was more important to look out for the future of their children and their grandchildren than their own political futures.
author: Scott Walker

quote: My message, especially to young people is to have courage to think differently, courage to invent, to travel the unexplored path, courage to discover the impossible and to conquer the problems and succeed. These are great qualities that they must work towards. This is my message to the young people.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: The secret to happiness is freedom... And the secret to freedom is courage.
author: Thucydides

quote: The courage in journalism is sticking up for the unpopular, not the popular.
author: Geraldo Rivera

quote: Courage is fire, and bullying is smoke.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: If you could get up the courage to begin, you have the courage to succeed.
author: David Viscott

quote: I try to be a truthful artist and I try to show a level of courage. I enjoy that. I'm a messenger.
author: Jeff Koons

quote: Courage is doing what you are afraid to do. There can be no courage unless you are scared.
author: Eddie Rickenbacker

quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
author: e. e. cummings

quote: The only reason I'm in Hollywood is that I don't have the moral courage to refuse the money.
author: Marlon Brando

quote: As a rock on the seashore he standeth firm, and the dashing of the waves disturbeth him not.  He raiseth his head like a tower on a hill, and the arrows of fortune drop at his feet.  In the instant of danger, the courage of his heart sustaineth him; and the steadiness of his mind beareth him out.
author: Akhenaton

quote: Courage is the ladder on which all the other virtues mount.
author: Clare Boothe Luce

quote: Overcoming the Cold War required courage from the people of Central and Eastern Europe and what was then the German Democratic Republic, but it also required the steadfastness of Western partner over many decades when many had long lost hope of integration of the two Germanys and Europe.
author: Angela Merkel

quote: The one thing I learned the most about acting is it takes a tremendous amount of courage to go there and stand still. It takes courage and guts to step out of your mind frame and depict something.
author: Carson Daly

quote: It requires greater courage to preserve inner freedom, to move on in one's inward journey into new realms, than to stand defiantly for outer freedom. It is often easier to play the martyr, as it is to be rash in battle.
author: Rollo May

quote: The brave man is not he who feels nofear. For that were stupid and irrational. But he, whose noble soul its fears subdues, and bravely dares the danger nature shrinks from.
author: Baillie, Joanna

quote: I have always had the courage for the new things that life sometimes offers.
author: Wallis Simpson

quote: Do you really think it is weakness that yields to temptation? I tell you that there are terrible temptations which it requires strength, strength and courage to yield to.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Faced with what is right, to leave it undone shows a lack of courage.
author: Confucius

quote: We've begun to raise daughters more like sons... but few have the courage to raise our sons more like our daughters.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: The courage of a soldier is found to be the cheapest and most common quality of human nature.
author: Edward Gibbon

quote: Courage! I have shown it for years think you I shall lose it at the moment when my sufferings are to end?
author: Marie Antoinette

quote: I never thought much of the courage of a lion tamer. Inside the cage he is at least safe from people.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: There are pretenders to piety as well as to courage.
author: Moliere

quote: Optimism is the foundation of courage.
author: Nicholas M. Butler

quote: Courage and perseverance have a magical talisman, before which difficulties disappear and obstacles vanish into air.
author: John Quincy Adams

quote: As the first Hispanic female governor in history, little girls often come up to me in the grocery store or the mall. They look and point, and when they get the courage, they ask 'Are you Susana?' and they run up and give me a hug.
author: Susana Martinez

quote: I started to send my work to journals when I was 26, which was just a question of when I got the courage up. They were mostly journals I had been reading for the previous six or seven years.
author: Marilyn Hacker

quote: Without strength and courage it's really hard to perform at the highest levels of international figure skating, because you're alone on the ice and you only have seven minutes over two nights to prove yourself.
author: Scott Hamilton

quote: Some of the greatest survivors have been women. Look at the courage so many women have shown after surviving earthquakes in the rubble for days on end.
author: Bear Grylls

quote: Overcoming the Cold War required courage from the people of Central and Eastern Europe and what was then the German Democratic Republic, but it also required the steadfastness of Western partner over many decades when many had long lost hope of integration of the two Germanys and Europe.
author: Angela Merkel

quote: True courage is like a kite; a contrary wind raises it higher.
author: Petit-Senn, John

quote: You may not always have a comfortable life and you will not always be able to solve all of the world's problems at once but don't ever underestimate the importance you can have because history has shown us that courage can be contagious and hope can take on a life of its own.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: We must have courage to bet on our ideas, to take the calculated risk, and to act. Everyday living requires courage if life is to be effective and bring happiness.
author: Maxwell Maltz

quote: It is only through labor and painful effort, by grim energy and resolute courage, that we move on to better things.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Do you really think it is weakness that yields to temptation? I tell you that there are terrible temptations which it requires strength, strength and courage to yield to.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: A man of great common sense and good taste - meaning thereby a man without originality or moral courage.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Untutored courage is useless in the face of educated bullets.
author: George S. Patton

quote: There are two types of courage involved with what I did. When it comes to picking up a rifle, millions of people are capable of doing that, as we see in Iraq or Vietnam. But when it comes to risking their careers, or risking being invited to lunch by the establishment, it turns out that's remarkably rare.
author: Daniel Ellsberg

quote: Courage is the capacity to confront what can be imagined.
author: Leo Rosten

quote: Women's courage is rather different from men's. The fact that women have to bring up children and look after husbands makes them braver at facing long-term issues, such as illness. Men are more immediately courageous. Lots of people are brave in battle.
author: Mary Wesley

quote: Lying at the root of the social agreements of 1980 are the courage, sense of responsibility, and the solidarity of the working people. Both sides have then recognized that an accord must be reached if bloodshed is to be prevented.
author: Lech Walesa

quote: We had no more courage than Harriet Tubman or Marcus Garvey had in their times. We just had a more vulnerable enemy.
author: Stokely Carmichael

quote: What makes America amazing is that there have always been men and women of courage who were willing to think more about the future of their children and grandchildren than they did about their own political careers.
author: Scott Walker

quote: I'm grateful to God for His bountiful gifts... He gave me courage and faith in myself.
author: Loretta Young

quote: When I was a boy, I used to pull a big cross saw with my dad. He'd use his right hand, so I'd have to use my left.
author: Joe Frazier

quote: All that really matters is I have two beautiful kids, and I'm trying to be the best dad I can possibly be, and that's the most important thing of all.
author: Tiger Woods

quote: My dad doesn't get any of my jokes. He laughs at them, but he doesn't understand them. He's just laughing because people around him are laughing.
author: Zach Galifianakis

quote: My mom's a social worker, and my dad works in non-profit organisations.
author: Seth Rogen

quote: My dad used to say to me, 'You look more like me than I do.'
author: Dhani Harrison

quote: When it came to the stylish and graceful art of ballroom dancing, my dad was a king of the clubs, a prowling tiger and a wonderfully natural mover.
author: Bruno Tonioli

quote: My mother always taught me, even my dad, just never let other people's opinions of you shape your opinion of yourself. And I never have and I never will.
author: Ruben Studdard

quote: Although my dad Harry is the manager of West Ham, we get on very well.
author: Jamie Redknapp

quote: I had an amazing childhood, lots of love. But my dad worked his tail off, getting up at 4 in the morning and going off at 5, 6 o'clock, yet he always had time to spend with his kids and his wife.
author: Criss Angel

quote: My mom and my dad were married 56 years, and the fact that I reconciled with my dad I think made their marriage a little bit better as well.
author: Larry Elder

quote: I love my mom and dad.
author: Taylor Momsen

quote: Whenever I did a good performance, my Dad and my uncles, who were rabid movie fans, took me to the movies. There began my underlying love affair with film.
author: Mel Torme

quote: When I grew up, people said, 'You'll never be the man your dad was.' And I said, 'Gee, I hope not.'
author: Rip Torn

quote: I don't really plan to be a pop star I just want to be able to make music without the whole My Dad thing hanging over me, which everyone in my position goes through.
author: Dhani Harrison

quote: I grew up in Greenwich Village. Dad was friends with John Lennon and Yoko Ono.
author: Yancy Butler

quote: My father was Catholic, my mother was Protestant, and because of that I got Christened in both churches, so I've got all these names... but my Dad always called me Mick.
author: Mickey Spillane

quote: I didn't always want to be a dad.
author: Liam Gallagher

quote: My dad told me that no one could ever make it as a writer, that my chances were equivalent to winning the lottery - which was good for me, because I like to have something to prove.
author: Poppy Z. Brite

quote: It wasn't like I was self-motivated. My dad started me. It was his dream before it was mine.
author: Venus Williams

quote: My Dad, a small-town lawyer, was also named Paul. Until we lost him when I was 16, he was a gentle presence in my life. I like to think he'd be proud of me and my sister and brothers, because I'm sure proud of him and of where I come from, Janesville, Wisconsin.
author: Paul Ryan

quote: I didn't have any role models really. My best friend was a dog. My mum and dad saved a dog from the gutter and that dog was my brother before Jesse was born. Sami was his name and he was my role model.
author: Ville Valo

quote: The best advice my dad ever gave me is that acting is believing. Acting is not acting. It isn't putting on a face and dancing around in a mask. It's believing that you are that character and playing him as if it were a normal day in the life of that character.
author: Haley Joel Osment

quote: My dad is very successful in his business. He's always been big in having hobbies and having little ways to get away. He always made time for hunting and fishing. He always encouraged me to do it.
author: Luke Bryan

quote: I am an obsessive garage cleaner - my wife and the neighbors make fun of me. I remember that my father was the same way, and now when I'm out there unearthing things in the garage, I realize I am becoming my dad!
author: Chris O'Donnell

quote: So I was always around music and my dad was in his own way a progressive jazzer, a big band jazzer guy.
author: Billy Sherwood

quote: I can definitely say the older I've got the better I've become at being a dad and a husband.
author: Rod Stewart

quote: I'm really, really lucky. I was given my dad's good genes.
author: Josh Brolin

quote: Babies don't need fathers, but mothers do. Someone who is taking care of a baby needs to be taken care of.
author: Amy Heckerling

quote: I had lost relationships with my dad, my brother and sister and I was just like, you know what, this is definitely the time to just get it together and so that's what I did.
author: Nicole Richie

quote: Every family is different. I am mom and I am dad and I'm going to do my best. You should be proud, walk through life saying I have the coolest family. I am part of a modern family.
author: Ricky Martin

quote: When I was about 12 and first started wearing lipstick, my dad would ask, 'Are you wearing makeup?' I would say back, 'You're wearing more makeup there than I am!'
author: Georgia Jagger

quote: A company that pays attention to the family unit is a successful company. We don't isolate the family. We don't make rides that say, 'Hey mom, dad, you go sit on the bench.'
author: Michael Eisner

quote: The best advice my dad ever gave me is that acting is believing. Acting is not acting. It isn't putting on a face and dancing around in a mask. It's believing that you are that character and playing him as if it were a normal day in the life of that character.
author: Haley Joel Osment

quote: My dad knows how to tell a story. He'd make me laugh by doing all the different voices.
author: Lily Collins

quote: The founder of the Mona Foundation actually knew my dad for years, and the more I learned about it, the more I realized I really found the perfect charity. It sponsors schools and educational initiatives all over the planet.
author: Rainn Wilson

quote: If my father had hugged me even once, I'd be an accountant right now.
author: Ray Romano

quote: My dad was kind of a pool shark and had a Frank Sinatra, Dean Martin thing going on. I've always been fascinated by the fifties because of him. There was a hip, cool, anything-goes atmosphere back then, but looking good was still a priority.
author: Dylan McDermott

quote: I always wanted to be a stay-at-home dad making art, making movies.
author: Robert Rodriguez

quote: My dad keeps joking about sneaking into my grandparents' house and switching out their HBO for PBS so they think I'm on 'Downton Abbey.'
author: Allison Williams

quote: My sensei was a British karate champion named Brian Fitkin. He was my mentor and because I had a hard relationship with my dad, he became a father figure to me.
author: Dolph Lundgren

quote: My dad was a diplomat and after living in America, where I was born, he was posted to Cairo.
author: Arabella Weir

quote: Because of my father, we are that Shining City on a Hill.
author: Michael Reagan

quote: I love my mom and dad.
author: Taylor Momsen

quote: Dad really had little to do with the songs, except to perform them.
author: Nancy Sinatra

quote: I would never have done what I'd done if I'd considered my father as somebody I wanted to please.
author: Robert Mapplethorpe

quote: My dad told us up front, 'Guys, if you want to play sports, go ahead, but it's your decision.'
author: Peyton Manning

quote: I am lucky to have had an attentive, curious and loving dad and heart-smart, down-to-earth, gifted mother. They changed the outlooks of their own lives and have never forgotten the people and organizations that helped them dream bigger than their circumstances should have allowed.
author: Jennifer Garner

quote: My Dad, a small-town lawyer, was also named Paul. Until we lost him when I was 16, he was a gentle presence in my life. I like to think he'd be proud of me and my sister and brothers, because I'm sure proud of him and of where I come from, Janesville, Wisconsin.
author: Paul Ryan

quote: I think people like to think I'm in some way financially dependent on my family - on my dad - but the fact of the matter is I've been emancipated from my father since I was 14 years old. That's something people don't know or understand.
author: Devon Aoki

quote: I was brought up in a car family, my dad loved cars and I was taught the art of making an Austin 7 operate.
author: Nick Mason

quote: You know, I had my mother and my father convincing me that he would be going back to Hollywood and he'd be back with the actresses and dating them and that he wasn't serious about me at all. So I had him saying one thing to me and my parents telling me something else.
author: Priscilla Presley

quote: I don't know any of us who are in relationships that are totally honest - it doesn't exist.
author: Richard Gere

quote: I've always gone out with much younger guys. But I rushed into relationships before really getting to know the person. What would come up as a warning sign within the first two weeks of dating would usually be the exact reason the relationship would end!
author: Carrie Ann Inaba

quote: Treasure your relationships, not your possessions.
author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quote: I don't really talk about my personal life. It's a strange and funny and weird thing. Sometimes you have a conversation with someone and the paparazzi snaps a picture of you and people decide you're dating. If I try to answer everything people say, I would be up all night.
author: Tracee Ellis Ross

quote: I wouldn't tell you anything about anybody I cared about because it becomes entertainment for other people, and it sort of just cheapens everything in your life. I would never tell you if I was dating anybody.
author: Kristen Stewart

quote: Things were a lot simpler in Detroit. I didn't care about anything but boyfriends.
author: Madonna Ciccone

quote: Taylor Swift dates guys so she can write a breakup song about them. I don't think she's dating for love - I think she's dating for creativity. So let's get her off the market and put her in dating detox. If she really wants love, she has to stop writing music about them.
author: Patti Stanger

quote: I've had two romances since moving to Las Vegas. One was with somebody 12 years older than me, and the other was the same age, and neither worked out. I know people still think of me as one of Hugh Hefner's girlfriends, and he of course was much older than me, but that was a whole different lifestyle and a different kind of dating.
author: Holly Madison

quote: Like many of you, I've always been slightly obsessed with vampires, dating back to the prime-time series 'Dark Shadows,' which I followed avidly as a kid.
author: Bill Condon

quote: I've never been Romeo who meets a girl and falls for her immediately. It's been a much slower process for me each time I've gone into a relationship.
author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quote: I tried to tell them about the dating process because I'm single now and how horrible it is and how many foolish experiences I had had dating. So I was really selling him hard, but the whole time he really wanted me!
author: Andie MacDowell

quote: I'm not very experienced with boys or the whole dating thingy.
author: Vanessa Hudgens

quote: If you're a sports fan you realize that when you meet somebody, like a girlfriend, they kind of have to root for your team. They don't have a choice.
author: Jimmy Fallon

quote: I always hated high-school shows and high-school movies, because they were always about the cool kids. It was always about dating and sex, and all the popular kids, and the good-looking kids. And the nerds were super-nerdy cartoons, with tape on their glasses. I never saw 'my people' portrayed accurately.
author: Paul Feig

quote: Rumors about me? Calista Flockhart, Pam Anderson, and Matt Damon. That's who I'm dating.
author: Ben Affleck

quote: You can't stop loving or wanting to love because when its right it's the best thing in the world. When you're in a relationship and its good, even if nothing else in your life is right, you feel like your whole world is complete.
author: Keith Sweat

quote: Thank God I never got in a fight. All of the jock dudes hated me, but all of their girlfriends thought I was nice so they wouldn't touch me. It was infuriating to them.
author: Mark Hoppus

quote: Right now I'm pretty single... My career is my boyfriend.
author: Christina Aguilera

quote: Treasure your relationships, not your possessions.
author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quote: I prefer ordinary girls - you know, college students, waitresses, that sort of thing. Most of the girls I go out with are just good friends. Just because I go out to the cinema with a girl, it doesn't mean we are dating.
author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quote: I have a lot of boyfriends, I want you to write that. Every country I visit, I have a different boyfriend. And I kiss them all.
author: Anna Kournikova

quote: Last year my boyfriend gave me a painting - a very personal one. I really prefer personal gifts or ones made by someone for me. Except diamonds. That's the exception to the rule.
author: Minnie Driver

quote: I give dating advice on a regular basis. It's not that I'm any expert, but it's always nice to share that with your friends.
author: Ashley Tisdale

quote: I like the bad-boy types. Generally the guy I'm attracted to is the guy in the club with all the tattoos and nail polish. He's usually the lead singer in a punk band and plays guitar. But my serious boyfriends are relatively clean-cut, nice guys. So it's strange.
author: Megan Fox

quote: I'm 31 now. I think I'm beginning to understand what life is, what romance is, and what a relationship means.
author: Adam Sandler

quote: Mary Tyler Moore was a working woman whose story lines were not always about dating and men. They were about work friendships and relationships, which is what I feel my adult life has mostly been about.
author: Tina Fey

quote: I am a hopeless romantic and I love to spoil my girlfriends.
author: Orlando Bloom

quote: If you're a sports fan you realize that when you meet somebody, like a girlfriend, they kind of have to root for your team. They don't have a choice.
author: Jimmy Fallon

quote: Right now I'm pretty single... My career is my boyfriend.
author: Christina Aguilera

quote: I got that experience through dating dozens of men for six years after college, getting an entry level magazine job at 21, working in the fiction department at Good Housekeeping and then working as a fashion editor there as well as writing many articles for the magazine.
author: Judith Krantz

quote: I am a hopeless romantic and I love to spoil my girlfriends.
author: Orlando Bloom

quote: I'm a fan of horrors. I love the ones that make you jump. My girlfriend hates it. I've been dating her for one-and-a-half years and I'm crazy about her, but she's terrified of horror films. Not the cute 'Will you hold me?' way, but she's weeping. With 'House of Wax,' we'll be sleeping and I'll go to the bathroom and she's sitting up waiting for me.
author: Jared Padalecki

quote: I wish I was dating one of the ladies in 'Bollywood Hero.' They're gorgeous. Any of them.
author: Chris Kattan

quote: I stopped dating for six months a year ago. Dating requires a lot of energy and focus.
author: Daphne Zuniga

quote: Maybe the most that you can expect from a relationship that goes bad is to come out of it with a few good songs.
author: Marianne Faithfull

quote: I've been dating younger men since my 20s, When I was 29, I dated someone 21... younger men are just more fun. I like their energy. I've always been kind of young for my age.
author: Dana Delany

quote: Things were a lot simpler in Detroit. I didn't care about anything but boyfriends.
author: Madonna Ciccone

quote: However successful you are, there is no substitute for a close relationship. We all need them.
author: Francesca Annis

quote: It's weird to have people so interested in your personal life. It's a part of the business that grosses me out. I'm always bummed out for people who just happen to be dating a celebrity, and they're also famous, and they can't live their life.
author: Andy Samberg

quote: However successful you are, there is no substitute for a close relationship. We all need them.
author: Francesca Annis

quote: I got that experience through dating dozens of men for six years after college, getting an entry level magazine job at 21, working in the fiction department at Good Housekeeping and then working as a fashion editor there as well as writing many articles for the magazine.
author: Judith Krantz

quote: Dating is all about the chase. It's fun!
author: Lauren Conrad

quote: Coming through the fire and through the storm of life with a strong man, my fiance Ashanti, whom I've been dating for eight months and two wonderful children beside me, I'm just so happy that I have been able to maintain my integrity and get to where I am today with the right energy around me.
author: Angie Stone

quote: Save a boyfriend for a rainy day - and another, in case it doesn't rain.
author: Mae West

quote: I think if I could have a boyfriend like my brothers I'd be really happy. But without the brother thing.
author: Patricia Velasquez

quote: I've always gone out with much younger guys. But I rushed into relationships before really getting to know the person. What would come up as a warning sign within the first two weeks of dating would usually be the exact reason the relationship would end!
author: Carrie Ann Inaba

quote: Real magic in relationships means an absence of judgment of others.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: When I was first divorced, I started dating younger women, and it was really exciting. But after a while I was like, 'This is just dumb.'
author: Louis C. K.

quote: No one knew me until I met my wife Lulu. Lulu's mother used to ask, Which one is Maurice? For six months she thought Lulu was dating Barry.
author: Maurice Gibb

quote: After your death you will be what you were before your birth.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Death is the liberator of him whom freedom cannot release, the physician of him whom medicine cannot cure, and the comforter of him whom time cannot console.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: Death is caused by swallowing small amounts of saliva over a long period of time.
author: George Carlin

quote: Death has always had a prominent place in my mind. There are times when I think somebody might kill me.
author: Dennis Rodman

quote: Death is an absolute mystery. We are all vulnerable to it, it's what makes life interesting and suspenseful.
author: Jeanne Moreau

quote: Death gives meaning to our lives. It gives importance and value to time. Time would become meaningless if there were too much of it.
author: Ray Kurzweil

quote: The disembodied spirit is immortal there is nothing of it that can grow old or die. But the embodied spirit sees death on the horizon as soon as its day dawns.
author: Thomas Hobbes

quote: Birth was the death of him.
author: Samuel Beckett

quote: Success is like death. The more successful you become, the higher the houses in the hills get and the higer the fences get.
author: Kevin Spacey

quote: Must not all things at the last be swallowed up in death?
author: Plato

quote: Islam is a religion of success. Unlike Christianity, which has as its main image, in the west at least, a man dying in a devastating, disgraceful, helpless death.
author: Karen Armstrong

quote: Death solves all problems - no man, no problem.
author: Joseph Stalin

quote: I love this pedal to death. The only way you could keep me from playing one is by chopping off my legs!
author: Kirk Hammett

quote: If we can't face death, we'll never overcome it. You have to look it straight in the eye. Then you can turn around and walk back out into the light.
author: Maya Lin

quote: There's really no such thing as the agony of dying. I'm quite sure that pain is shut off at the moment of death. You see, something happens when the body knows it's about to go. Peptide hormones are released by cells in the hypothalamus and pituitary gland. Endorphins. They attach themselves to the cells responsible for feeling pain.
author: Lewis Thomas

quote: Judged by the law of England, I know this crime entails upon me the penalty of death but the history of Ireland explains that crime and justifies it.
author: Thomas Francis Meagher

quote: Success is like death. The more successful you become, the higher the houses in the hills get and the higer the fences get.
author: Kevin Spacey

quote: It is not death, but dying, which is terrible.
author: Henry Fielding

quote: I know not what others may choose but, as for me, give me liberty or give me death.
author: Patrick Henry

quote: Take care of your life and the Lord will take care of your death.
author: George Whitefield

quote: Faithfulness to the past can be a kind of death above ground. Writing of the past is a resurrection the past then lives in your words and you are free.
author: Jessamyn West

quote: So we mustn't lower our guard in any sense because of what has happened in terms of the death of Osama Bin Laden and we are certainly not doing that. The terror threat level here in the U.K. remains at severe and we're very conscious of the need to continue that.
author: Theresa May

quote: Prohibit the taking of omens, and do away with superstitious doubts. Then, until death itself comes, no calamity need be feared.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: Life isn't fair. It's just fairer than death, that's all.
author: William Goldman

quote: A friend who dies, it's something of you who dies.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: My death, taking the light from my eyes, gives back to the day the purity which they soiled.
author: Jean Racine

quote: I know not what others may choose but, as for me, give me liberty or give me death.
author: Patrick Henry

quote: From my rotting body, flowers shall grow and I am in them and that is eternity.
author: Edvard Munch

quote: Every spiritual tradition has this idea of death and resurrection. It's not unique to Christianity.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: It's an incredible con job when you think about it, to believe something now in exchange for something after death. Even corporations with their reward systems don't try to make it posthumous.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: A single death is a tragedy, a million deaths is a statistic.
author: Stalin, Joseph

quote: Dying is easy, it's living that scares me to death.
author: Annie Lennox

quote: People are scared to death of dying. I am the opposite.
author: Taylor Caldwell

quote: The call of death is a call of love. Death can be sweet if we answer it in the affirmative, if we accept it as one of the great eternal forms of life and transformation.
author: Hermann Hesse

quote: Nothing is a matter of life and death except life and death.
author: Angela Carter

quote: I am become death, the destroyer of worlds.
author: J. Robert Oppenheimer

quote: Judged by the law of England, I know this crime entails upon me the penalty of death but the history of Ireland explains that crime and justifies it.
author: Thomas Francis Meagher

quote: The U.S. couldn't even get rid of Saddam Hussein. And we all know that the EU is just a passing fad. They'll be killing each other again in less than a year. I'm sick to death of all these fascist lawsuits.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Death, so called, is a thing which makes men weep, And yet a third of life is passed in sleep.
author: Byron, Lord

quote: Those who have the strength and the love to sit with a dying patient in the silence that goes beyond words will know that this moment is neither frightening nor painful, but a peaceful cessation of the functioning of the body.
author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quote: From my rotting body, flowers shall grow and I am in them and that is eternity.
author: Edvard Munch

quote: It is not death, but dying, which is terrible.
author: Henry Fielding

quote: Achieving life is not the equivalent of avoiding death.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: When we have done our best, we can, as a united people, take whatever may befall with calm courage and confidence that this old nation will survive and if death should come to many of us, death is not the end.
author: Eamon de Valera

quote: Death, like birth, is a secret of Nature.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Of all the gods only death does not desire gifts.
author: Aeschylus

quote: If the human condition were the periodic table, maybe love would be hydrogen at No. 1. Death would be helium at No. 2. Power, I reckon, would be where oxygen is.
author: David Mitchell

quote: Know one knows whether death, which people fear to be the greatest evil, may not be the greatest good.
author: Plato

quote: That which is so universal as death must be a benefit.
author: Friedrich Schiller

quote: Policemen so cherish their status as keepers of the peace and protectors of the public that they have occasionally been known to beat to death those citizens or groups who question that status.
author: David Mamet

quote: Unfortunately, the client that exists today is still pretty much the prototype design.
author: Shawn Fanning

quote: A good designer must rely on experience, on precise, logic thinking and on pedantic exactness. No magic will do.
author: Niklaus Wirth

quote: An image is not simply a trademark, a design, a slogan or an easily remembered picture. It is a studiously crafted personality profile of an individual, institution, corporation, product or service.
author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: Gaming in general is a male thing. It isn't that gaming is designed to exclude women. Everybody who's tried to design a game to interest a large female audience has failed. And I think that has to do with the different thinking processes of men and women.
author: Gary Gygax

quote: I see the Beijing National Stadium as an architectural project. I accepted Herzog and De Meuron's invitation to collaborate on the design, and our proposal won the competition. From beginning to end, I stayed with the project. I am committed to fostering relationships between a city and its architecture.
author: Ai Weiwei

quote: In its report, the Cox Committee concludes that China is using stolen U.S. design information to speed up its deployment of a new nuclear missile force.
author: Charles Foster Bass

quote: Different people have different styles, but there is an opportunity as a director to be a writer in every moment, with every visual cue and every piece of production design. Everything is a decision, and everything can be obsessed over.
author: B. J. Novak

quote: I finished high school there and then I went to Rhode Island School of Design.
author: Stephen Sprouse

quote: Almost all quality improvement comes via simplification of design, manufacturing... layout, processes, and procedures.
author: Tom Peters

quote: I prefer design by experts - by people who know what they are doing.
author: Donald Norman

quote: Even private persons in due season, with discretion and temper, may reprove others, whom they observe to commit sin, or follow bad courses, out of charitable design, and with hope to reclaim them.
author: Isaac Barrow

quote: In my opinion, no single design is apt to be optimal for everyone.
author: Donald Norman

quote: For me, I am still very happy to be able to do stage design as it's an opportunity to express the extreme.
author: Christian Lacroix

quote: The mind is like a richly woven tapestry in which the colors are distilled from the experiences of the senses, and the design drawn from the convolutions of the intellect.
author: Carson McCullers

quote: Actually, I didn't make the claim that Ruby follows the principle of least surprise. Someone felt the design of Ruby follows that philosophy, so they started saying that. I didn't bring that up, actually.
author: Yukihiro Matsumoto

quote: Computers are scary. They're nightmares to fix, lose our stuff, and, on occasion, they crash, producing the blue screen of death. Steve Jobs knew this. He knew that computers were bulky and hernia-inducing and Darth Vader black. He understood the value of declarative design.
author: Wesley Morris
