quote: No wonder the film industry started in the desert in California where, like all desert dwellers, they dream their buildings, rather than design them.
author: Arthur Erickson

quote: Ever since I was young I loved making things and being part of the design process.
author: Maria Sharapova

quote: It is only after years of preparation that the young artist should touch color - not color used descriptively, that is, but as a means of personal expression.
author: Henri Matisse

quote: That's a hobby of mine - to do whatever I can for unusual for-hire creative projects. I am waiting for someone to really challenge me - obviously I'm often approached to do film related work, but I would be very happy to design a bar or an amusement park ride. I would love to be an imagineer!
author: Roman Coppola

quote: Design can never be an ultimate explanation for anything. It can only be a proximate explanation. A plane or a car is explained by a designer but that's because the designer himself, the engineer, is explained by natural selection.
author: Richard Dawkins

quote: Actually, I didn't make the claim that Ruby follows the principle of least surprise. Someone felt the design of Ruby follows that philosophy, so they started saying that. I didn't bring that up, actually.
author: Yukihiro Matsumoto

quote: Design and technology should be the subject where mathematical brainboxes and science whizzkids turn their bright ideas into useful products.
author: James Dyson

quote: I used to design for my body, which was flat-chested with big hips. That's why my clothes were tight on top with full skirts.
author: Betsey Johnson

quote: Design is the fundamental soul of a man-made creation that ends up expressing itself in successive outer layers of the product or service. The iMac is not just the color or translucence or the shape of the shell. The essence of the iMac is to be the finest possible consumer computer in which each element plays together.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Design my own line? No, I just like the culture.
author: ASAP Rocky

quote: The principle of the design - the harmony, rhythm and balance are all the same with interior and fashion design.
author: Venus Williams

quote: Art has to move you and design does not, unless it's a good design for a bus.
author: David Hockney

quote: The design of each element should be thought out in order to be easy to make and easy to repair.
author: Leo Fender

quote: I prefer design by experts - by people who know what they are doing.
author: Donald Norman

quote: When I come to a design decision, people know that is that.
author: Carlos Ghosn

quote: While I was at college studying design I decided to paint. I was also greatly inspired by the colours that I had seen on my travels in the Brazilian Rain forest.
author: John Dyer

quote: I'd like to do a lot of things - whether in design or architecture or business.
author: Caroline Wozniacki

quote: After the Great Depression and after public urging, a nationwide public competition was held to determine a design for a memorial that would honor President Thomas Jefferson's bold vision for westward expansion for America.
author: Russ Carnahan

quote: A purpose, an intention, a design, strikes everywhere even the careless, the most stupid thinker.
author: David Hume

quote: I finished high school there and then I went to Rhode Island School of Design.
author: Stephen Sprouse

quote: I don't start with a design objective, I start with a communication objective. I feel my project is successful if it communicates what it is supposed to communicate.
author: Mike Davidson

quote: I am persuaded, that if any attempt is made to improve the education of the poor, and such an unmanly spirit should guide the resolution of a society or committee for that purpose, it would render the design abortive.
author: Joseph Lancaster

quote: If you're talking to an architect, he can look at a blank piece of paper, and once the initial design is there, the formula kicks in. Each room should have something unique and different about it - much the same way that in a song, every eight bars or so, a new piece of information should be introduced.
author: Ryan Tedder

quote: Through all aspects of society be it art, design, the financial markets, government, technology or communications we are witnessing unprecedented global transformation - the result of which is impossible to predict.
author: Malcolm Mclaren

quote: I don't set goals. Like, that's what I want to be doing however many years from now. I do what I love to do at the moment. If I wake up tomorrow and decide I want to dance, that's what I'd do. Or design clothes.
author: Ayumi Hamasaki

quote: English is taking over the world. I just wrote a piece about it. And it's not by design. The United States dominates because it's the biggest market.
author: Norman Spinrad

quote: I've generally got a good eye for design and proportion.
author: Bruce Oldfield

quote: I finished high school there and then I went to Rhode Island School of Design.
author: Stephen Sprouse

quote: I like design, I like details, to me it is just another form of self-expression.
author: John Malkovich

quote: The universe we observe has precisely the properties we should expect if there is, at bottom, no design, no purpose, no evil, no good, nothing but blind, pitiless indifference.
author: Richard Dawkins

quote: I don't design cars. I'm not a designer. I know what I desire to be built, I know what the end result is, the horsepower, the competition we'll be working against - but I leave it to the people who work with me to put it all together. I don't do anything.
author: Caroll Shelby

quote: Well, yes, I mean, I think that, you know, my sources suggest that there's a lot of support for the notion that there is a lot of Koran abuse and that it was very much a systematic design, not just an aberration.
author: Jane Mayer

quote: Good design begins with honesty, asks tough questions, comes from collaboration and from trusting your intuition.
author: Freeman Thomas

quote: It is only after years of preparation that the young artist should touch color - not color used descriptively, that is, but as a means of personal expression.
author: Henri Matisse

quote: The follow your dreams thing is really important because so many people are railroaded into taking other paths by their family, their friends, people who should be supportive going, 'What are you talking about?' Even just seemingly regular career paths, but if it's not what people expect for you they kind of react funny.
author: Joan Jett

quote: Business and growing jobs is about taking risk, sometimes failing, sometimes succeeding, but always striving. It is about dreams. Usually, it doesn't work out exactly as you might have imagined. Steve Jobs was fired at Apple. He came back and changed the world.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: It's not too late, I can still live my dreams.
author: Diana Nyad

quote: Myths are public dreams, dreams are private myths.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: In my dreams I hear again the crash of guns, the rattle of musketry, the strange, mournful mutter of the battlefield.
author: Douglas MacArthur

quote: Dreams have always expanded our understanding of reality by challenging our boundaries of the real, of the possible.
author: Henry Reed

quote: Our dreams must be stronger than our memories. We must be pulled by our dreams, rater than pushed by our memories.
author: Jesse Jackson

quote: Our life dreams the Utopia. Our death achieves the Ideal.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: You have to dream before your dreams can come true.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: I love working with kids, talking with them and listening to them. I always encourage kids to reach beyond their dreams. Don't try to be like me. Be better than me.
author: Florence Griffith Joyner

quote: In my wildest dreams, I could not have imagined a sweeter life.
author: Hugh Hefner

quote: Whatever dreams I have wished have come true.
author: Annette Funicello

quote: Dream the impossible because dreams do come true.
author: Elijah Wood

quote: Love is the most terrible, and also the most generous of the passions it is the only one which includes in its dreams the happiness of someone else.
author: Alphonse Karr

quote: To all, to each, a fair good-night, And pleasing dreams, and slumbers light.
author: Scott, Sir Walter

quote: As soon as I became old enough to make my dreams my reality, I became a firm believer that the subconscious and the world outside of our flesh and blood is essentially the truth.
author: Melissa Auf der Maur

quote: Freedom is not an ideal, it is not even a protection, if it means nothing more than freedom to stagnate, to live without dreams, to have no greater aim than a second car and another television set.
author: Adlai Stevenson

quote: As I watched bookstores close, I began to wonder how that felt for the owners. Owning a bookstore was their dream and now they're struggling and seeing those dreams fall apart.
author: Karen Kingsbury

quote: What differentiates us from animals is the fact that we can listen to other people's dreams, fears, joys, sorrows, desires and defeats - and they in turn can listen to ours.
author: Henning Mankell

quote: Seems like God don't see fit to give the black man nothing but dreams - but He did give us children to make them dreams seem worthwhile.
author: Lorraine Hansberry

quote: I do not know whether I was then a man dreaming I was a butterfly, or whether I am now a butterfly dreaming I am a man.
author: Zhuangzi

quote: God, that dumping ground of our dreams.
author: Jean Rostand

quote: To become truly immortal, a work of art must escape all human limits: logic and common sense will only interfere. But once these barriers are broken, it will enter the realms of childhood visions and dreams.
author: Giorgio de Chirico

quote: Believe in and follow your dreams.
author: Kristanna Loken

quote: As I watched bookstores close, I began to wonder how that felt for the owners. Owning a bookstore was their dream and now they're struggling and seeing those dreams fall apart.
author: Karen Kingsbury

quote: I would go to bed every night and have dreams about having a time machine and somehow I'd have the ability to move through time and space freely, and save Anne Frank.
author: Jeff Mangum

quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.
author: J. K. Rowling

quote: To be here today is just beyond my wildest dreams.
author: Rick Yune

quote: If you can't read, it's going to be hard to realize dreams.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: Most 'reality' shows aren't reality at all. They're game shows with no prize. Like 'Rock of Love.' His aren't genuine feelings. Then again, Bob Barker didn't really care whether or not you won the toaster. Sorry to shatter everyone's dreams.
author: Hal Sparks

quote: Business and growing jobs is about taking risk, sometimes failing, sometimes succeeding, but always striving. It is about dreams. Usually, it doesn't work out exactly as you might have imagined. Steve Jobs was fired at Apple. He came back and changed the world.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: You can plant a dream.
author: Anne Campbell

quote: I do not know whether I was then a man dreaming I was a butterfly, or whether I am now a butterfly dreaming I am a man.
author: Zhuangzi

quote: I love my early movies, but naturalism is an artist's early style. Now I want to deal with feelings, dreams, an acceptance of irrationality.
author: Irvin Kershner

quote: Am I athletic? In my dreams.
author: Hugh Bonneville

quote: Everyone wants to look their best, everyone has dreams of wanting to look like something else. But we are who we are.
author: Samantha Morton

quote: When you're a young English person who wants to be an actress and you have dreams, you dream of being Vanessa Redgrave or Judi Dench.
author: Janet McTeer

quote: People have to remain positive and believe in those dreams. It's really important.
author: Kirsty Coventry

quote: No one may speak for the dead, no one may interpret their mutilated dreams and visions.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: We have lost that which has made us great over the generations, and that is the sense of individual and personal responsibility that we can come up, we can pursue our dreams and our aspirations and we won't be blocked by government regulation, by the inability to get a loan as a small business to make our dreams come true.
author: Jon Huntsman, Jr.

quote: You don't get old until you replace dreams with regrets.
author: Troy Dumais

quote: Without leaps of imagination, or dreaming, we lose the excitement of possibilities. Dreaming, after all, is a form of planning.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: My father, his spirit is with me constantly, and I'm a believer in that world and the world of dreams and that stuff.
author: Ziggy Marley

quote: Dreams have only the pigmentation of fact.
author: Djuna Barnes

quote: I think when you're in a relationship where you really care for the other person, when they achieve their dreams it's better than when you do yourself.
author: Nicole Kidman

quote: Cherish your visions and your dreams as they are the children of your soul, the blueprints of your ultimate achievements.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Dream manfully and nobly, and thy dreams shall be prophets.
author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: Reality is wrong. Dreams are for real.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: Myths are public dreams, dreams are private myths.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: It takes someone with a vision of the possibilities to attain new levels of experience. Someone with the courage to live his dreams.
author: Les Brown
